title: Sound On: Stagflation Risk, Democrats Defend Abortion Rights
itunes:title: Sound On: Stagflation Risk, Democrats Defend Abortion Rights
description:
Guests: Host of Masters in Business, Barry Ritholtz, Megan Greene, Global Chief Economist at Kroll, Bloomberg politics contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Republican Strategist, Amy Tarkanian.
